Title: Hostel
Overview: Three backpackers head to a Slovakian city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.
production_companies: International Production Company, Raw Nerve, Lionsgate, Next Entertainment, Screen Gems, Hostel LLC
Cast: Jay Hernandez, Derek Richardson, Eythor Gudjonsson
